locations.title: Petro Travel Center
locations.content: Petro Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Plenty of parking for professional drivers! Some of the best fuel prices around! Bathrooms & showers are clean! Store is decently clean & stocked pretty well! The evening shower attendant does a great job at making sure the showers are ‚Ä¶

Cool place good food. But be carefull sending someone in for a shower. They apparently will decline showers if they think you dont look like a trucker. Had to go in with my buddy who had his mom and just wanted a shower. Your cashiers ‚Ä¶

Very clean shower and shower attendant and cashier were very nice and helpful people. The shower water was too hot for me and it wouldn't turn any colder. I know most people are the opposite of me and would probably love it like that though ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , we ended it with slice of chocolate cake and ice-cream, and a slice of cheesecake,  And the water pressure in the shower was great, except the floor was wet as there was no step up into the shower, and the cashier in morning was very ‚Ä¶

If you want to take a shower, go somewhere else. The showers have no curtains, and everything gets soaking wet. Try getting dressed there afterwards. There are some showers that are designed to not have curtains, but not these. And if that ‚Ä¶

Amazing staff!! The gentleman working front counter was so full of personality and was helpful when couldn't get app to work for team showers. The showers were spotless with lots of hot water and perfect amount of towels supplied. Leaving ‚Ä¶

Terrible selection of water, and everything is overpriced. Shower had decent flow but the f ucking shower curtain rod fell on me. Not a very good truck stop in my opinion, totally in line with Petros standards though.

‚Ä¶ Because I was sitting in the driver's lounge waiting on my wife to get out of the shower that I paid for and I am a CDL driver. They immediately started asking me to prove that I was a CDL driver and I had a right to be in their store. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ machines with only 1 working and 8 dryers and 4 working. Over 2hour wait to take shower on Saturday morning only 2 ahead of me and over hour later no one has moved up. Public bathroom ran out of paper towels and convience store ran out ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ for the weekend. Definitely plenty of parking spots to start on a positive note. However, the shower smells like sewer gas, the coffee in the gas station area was burnt to hell, and the iron skillet took over an hour to get me my order.

‚Ä¶ I can because that is the right thing to do. Especially when they are traveling through that is what Truck Stops are all about. A place travelers can go to take a shower, use the bathroom or to relax from being on the road for too long.
Fuel prices low...shower are clean and water pressure is üëç...they only give u a dry towel and wash cloth.. ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Went in shower ten. Took a shower, got out, was gonna brush my teeth, saw shavings from the last person who shaved in the sink! Decided this is not where I want to be any longer. Got dressed and walked out. Obviously they do not care enough ‚Ä¶

No flag.
Small showers. Not stool in the shower.
Low on stock.
Too many reserved parking spots.
I came for the fuel prices .
Not good food menu.
Very good parking, great shower, beer üçª available. ‚Ä¶

I stay here twice a week and they have gotten better‚Ä¶ only issue for me is the half cleaning of the restrooms and showers.. they have the toilet seat lifted as if it‚Äôs been cleaned but u clearly see the left behind waste on toilet lid. I ‚Ä¶
washing machines don't work, shower works sometimes! avoid this place! better Loves

‚Ä¶ What I like most about the gas station side. They had everything you can think of. Of course prices were a little too high, that is what you expect nowadays. I took a peek at the shower side of the station, it also looked clean. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ and they get it right the first time. No wait for a shower, I'm guessing the turn around time is really quick as the towels were still hot from the dryer when I went to pick them up. Great water pressure and plety of parking! This place ‚Ä¶

Went in for a job and found out that this gas station had NO PORTERS and NO ONE  CLEANS THE SHOWER ROOMS stated from a employeee that the people who use the showers are told to hand dry the shower as they leave this is a health hazard and ‚Ä¶

The young man in charge of the showers is very professional. He acknowleged my presence and asked if i needed an extra towel, he also wished me a great day unpon leaving the area, the shower was spotless clean, very hot water, nice pressure ‚Ä¶

Very clean and nice. My husband drives a truck and we occasionally take our showers there. The bathroom/shower is very hot. By time you finish your shower you are sweating so bad you need another shower.
